query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `accountSettings` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`plan` enum('free','pro','enterprise') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free',
	`creditsUsed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`creditsTotal` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	`creditsResetAt` timestamp NULL,
	`signalScoreThreshold` decimal(3,2) DEFAULT 0.5,
	`alertsEnabled` int DEFAULT 1,
	`apiKey` varchar(64),
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `accountSettings_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	CONSTRAINT `accountSettings_userId_unique` UNIQUE(`userId`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3toqCak8FVUcNAx.a115fa71bfe1 --database 9LHEQeubFHnQup6Tcc9W3W --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `accountSettings` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`plan` enum('free','pro','enterprise') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free',
	`creditsUsed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`creditsTotal` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	`creditsResetAt` timestamp NULL,
	`signalScoreThreshold` decimal(3,2) DEFAULT 0.5,
	`alertsEnabled` int DEFAULT 1,
	`apiKey` varchar(64),
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `accountSettings_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	CONSTRAINT `accountSettings_userId_unique` UNIQUE(`userId`)
)
